title: champ select lagging problem
body: I wanna ask if anyone experience a lagging situation while champ select like i click my champ many times but until the time is over it still said that I did't select a champ. I checked my internet speed and stuff all are fine but it still stuck there. It have been happening for few weeks. I got those 5 mins punish for like over 5 times and sometimes just able to lock in at last sec. Can anyone tell me wt to do please

replies.body:
This happened to me at least once, but it did not persist.
I am on a Wifi by the way.
Are you using Wireless (Wifi), or Wired connection?
If you use Wireless connection, consider updating your Wifi driver and see if it will help you solve the issue, do a google search on how to update Wifi driver.
